Welcome to ler’s documentation!

ler

ler (/ˈɛlɚ/): Lensed (or un-lensed) gravitational waves Event (compact-binaries) Rate calculator and simulator.

ler is a statistical based python package whose core function is to calculate detectable rates of gravitational waves events. Description available in README.md.

The code is available at ler.github.
